meanings.definition: A book or set of books containing articles on various topics, usually arranged in alphabetical order
meanings.sent1: I found an encyclopedia in the library to learn about dinosaurs.
meanings.sent2: My grandmother gifted me an encyclopedia for my birthday.
meanings.sent3: The encyclopedia fell off the shelf and startled the cat.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an encyclopedia, full of knowledge on every subject.
meanings.sent5: The encyclopedia was a treasure trove of information waiting to be explored.

meanings.definition: A comprehensive reference work containing articles on a wide range of subjects
meanings.sent1: The school library had an encyclopedia that covered history, science, and art.
meanings.sent2: She used the encyclopedia to research her school project on space exploration.
meanings.sent3: The encyclopedia was so heavy that it made the table creak under its weight.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an encyclopedia, always ready with facts and details.
meanings.sent5: The encyclopedia was a beacon of knowledge in a sea of uncertainty.
